layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 784x18
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,0) size 784x18
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (0,0) size 6x18 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutInline {B} at (0,0) size 6x17
                LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 6x17
                  text run at (0,0) width 6: "\x{B7}"
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (6,0) size 778x18 [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 396x17
                text run at (0,0) width 396: "There should be space between the bullet and this line of text."
